attributes.action: Rid the Nation of the pernicious cancer in our society which masquerades under the guise of Political Correctness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political Correctness is the most divisive tool ever utilised in the control of mankind.  It has killed freedom of speech and sets man against man, brother againsts brother.  And all this in the name of equality.
Competitive attitudes have been frowned upon and an air of total inclusion would appear to be the norm.
Nobody is allowed to lose, so nobody really knows what it's like to win.
It's little wonder that the UK fails to produce winning sports teams with any regularity.

Let's turn the clock back some years and return to a genuine society, one which is not frightened out of speaking its mind in honesty, yet still cares for those less fortunate.
